main event: A civilian reported seeing an oval-shaped object with a bubble on top in Little Rock, Arkansas on March 22, 1967.
interesting points: The object was brilliant white and approximately the size of an automobile., The UFO emitted a faint buzzing sound., It was observed for about 30-35 seconds., The object was 35 degrees above the horizon, moving in a north-northeast direction., The object appeared to fly toward the observer, then slowed down before increasing speed and disappearing over the horizon.
sighted object: one oval-shaped object with a bubble on top
witness description: students aged 14 to 16 from Little Rock, Arkansas
